Text: This is a fucking brilliant piece of software ^_^
Is there a specific way to use the crack; it's not working for me.
I can't get the Crack to work either.

To get it to work, go to the installation directory. you should see a file called "hfxpcp" back up the file, and copy the cracked one that was included with the torrent to the installation directory. After you copy and paste the file it should work.
